class.name: While EFCore doesn't support TPC out the box, this kind of polymorphic relationship will not be possible unless you silently convert it to a TPT behind the scenes in which case the BaseClass needs to no longer indicate it has a Key and the RootAbstact makes its own table.
class.display: While EFCore doesn't support TPC out the box, this kind of polymorphic relationship will not be possible unless you silently convert it to a TPT behind the scenes in which case the BaseClass needs to no longer indicate it has a Key and the RootAbstact makes its own table.
